entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cummins Lakes (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.7°C

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Snow beginning before morning. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
